name: Hellscape: The Game
description:
Demo playable in-browser above. If you're on Windows, we recommend playing the downloadable version of the demo, as the browser version may experience some performance/graphical issues.

It was a normal, boring day in Megan's History class. That is, until she did the unthinkable: take her phone out in front of the teacher. Now Megan finds herself in The Hellscape: a twisted dimension of Kennethar's creation. Determined to get her phone back, she'll brave this unknown world. Along the way, she'll meet friendly friends, and not-so-friendly foes. Can Megan find a way to save the teachers, students, and (most importantly) her phone from the clutches of the evil elder god?

CONTROLS:

[ARROW KEYS] - Move around.

[SPACE/ENTER/Z] - Interact with objects/menus. Progress/fast forward dialogue.

[SHIFT] - Hold shift to run.

[ESC/X] - Open menus/undo previous action in menu
